name: Mahira's Troubled Past
description:
Hi everyone!

This short Visual Novel is set in the land of Skyrim (from The Elder Scrolls franchise). It was created as a side-story to my comic series about a young Khajiit mage named Mahira, and her many mishaps in the far north. If you're interested, please give it a read here: https://www.deviantart.com/skadierendra/gallery/46952678/Ja-Khajiit

I plan this game to be the beginning of a longer story, so hopefully more "chapters" are to follow ;)

The game is free to download, please enjoy!
